text: Thomas Jack Lee (1935 â€“ February 24, 2019) was an American engineer. He was the sixth Director of the NASA Marshall Space Flight Center in Huntsville, Alabama, from July 6, 1989 to January 6, 1994. Lee was born in Wedowee, Alabama. Lee died on February 24, 2019 in Birmingham, Alabama from pancreatic cancer, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * NASA biography Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Engineers from Alabama Category:Scientists from Huntsville, Alabama
title: T. Jack Lee
